title: Stream: Alt-J (∆) – An Awesome Wave
content:
One of the most hotly anticipated debut albums of 2012, Alt-J’s An Awesome Wave has already begun to receive rave reviews and is now available to stream below.

Featuring previous singles Fitzpleasure, Matilda and Breezeblocks, it’s a hugely invigorating and engaging listen. Check out An Awesome Wave in full below which is released 28 May and pre-order it via Alt-J’s website, Via NME.com
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
